content.rendered:
VPRCOMM magazine - new media partner of 24Fashion TV.

VPRCOM


VPRCOM magazine is an American fashion and lifestyle magazine that covers many topics, including fashion, beauty, culture, living, and runway. The depth of content and reporting found in VPRCOM magazine has made it the perfect partner for 24Fashion TV as both publications expand and occupy a bigger niche in the Fashion reporting industry.
